name: Geometry Clash
description:
WELCOME TO GEOMETRY CLASH: 

You and a friend will have to fight as long as possible the different bosses present in the game. Be carefull with the friendly fire! if you want...

This game was developped during a two week GameJam! Don't forget to check out the other games made during those weeks! 

Features: 

- Local Multiplayer;

- We intend to do infinite rounds of bosses, for the moment we have one;

- Lots of different powers to attack and defend yourself;

- We are working on the visual and auditory feedback.

Any suggestions and feedbacks will be much appreciated.

CREDITS:
